content.raw:
According to [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/api) X2 configuration #4 should be:

`X2 	#4 	30m 270-deg planar Lidar 	1280x960 2D camera 	IMU`

I am running the DockerHub version:

[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub)

with team configuration `worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_01 robotName1:=X2L
  robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4 robotName2:=X2R
  robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4`

The docker image is 5 days old:

\`REPOSITORY                     TAG                           IMAGE ID            CREATED             SIZE

nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed   latest                        64777efadabf        5 days ago          4.79GB\`

but according to Release Notes:  
[#!/osrf/subt/wiki/SubT Release Notes & Updates](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/SubT%20Release%20Notes%20&%20Updates)

there were no robot configuration changes, so I expect the same behavior?? Our program fails due to missing topic:

`AssertionError: ('/X2R/camera_front/image_raw/compressed', [])`

and it really looks like RGBD camera is used instead of RGB:

`developer@gpu-desktop:~/subt_ws$ rostopic list`  
`/X2L/air_pressure`  
`/X2L/cmd_vel`  
`/X2L/command/motor_speed`  
`/X2L/front/camera_info`  
`/X2L/front/depth`  
`/X2L/front/image_raw`  
`/X2L/front_scan`  
`/X2L/imu/data`  
`/X2L/magnetic_field`  
`/X2L/odom`  
`/X2L/pose`  
`/X2R/air_pressure`  
`/X2R/cmd_vel`  
`/X2R/command/motor_speed`  
`/X2R/front/camera_info`  
`/X2R/front/depth`  
`/X2R/front/image_raw`  
`/X2R/front_scan`  
`/X2R/imu/data`  
`/X2R/magnetic_field`  
`/X2R/odom`  
`/X2R/pose`  
`/clock`  
`/rosout`  
`/rosout_agg`  
`/subt/score`  
`/tf`  
`/tf_static`

Thanks Martin/Robotika Team
content.html:
According to #!/osrf/subt/wiki/api X2 configuration #4 should be:

X2 #4 30m 270-deg planar Lidar 1280x960 2D camera IMU

I am running the DockerHub version:

#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/SystemSetupDockerhub

with team configuration worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_01 robotName1:=X2L robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4 robotName2:=X2R robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_4

The docker image is 5 days old:

`REPOSITORY TAG IMAGE ID CREATED SIZE

nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed latest 64777efadabf 5 days ago 4.79GB`

but according to Release Notes:
#!/osrf/subt/wiki/SubT Release Notes & Updates

there were no robot configuration changes, so I expect the same behavior?? Our program fails due to missing topic:

AssertionError: ('/X2R/camera_front/image_raw/compressed', [])

and it really looks like RGBD camera is used instead of RGB:

developer@gpu-desktop:~/subt_ws$ rostopic list
/X2L/air_pressure
/X2L/cmd_vel
/X2L/command/motor_speed
/X2L/front/camera_info
/X2L/front/depth
/X2L/front/image_raw
/X2L/front_scan
/X2L/imu/data
/X2L/magnetic_field
/X2L/odom
/X2L/pose
/X2R/air_pressure
/X2R/cmd_vel
/X2R/command/motor_speed
/X2R/front/camera_info
/X2R/front/depth
/X2R/front/image_raw
/X2R/front_scan
/X2R/imu/data
/X2R/magnetic_field
/X2R/odom
/X2R/pose
/clock
/rosout
/rosout_agg
/subt/score
/tf
/tf_static

Thanks Martin/Robotika Team
